caption: Had a good experience here with my girlfriend. The food came rapidly and the customer service is just excellent. Prices are convenient.

ordered curry shrimp w rice and peas. HORRIBLE. The rice smells sour and is spoiled, the plantains are rock solid! i tried chewing one up and WOW. had to take it out and throw it out with the rest of the plate! only the shrimp was edible! First and last time going there!

The crab legs are so large and tasty,  the shrimp, labster mouth watering if you get your meal from Pat without a smile your food is free tell her I say so . Such pleasant customers service and the food is just nice you just have to taste it for yourself. Mmmmm good
The owner is a gem. She is always smiling when she serves you. The food is delicious
Got there and they said the food was done but they were hospitable, gracious and kind in their delivery. They encouraged us to come again to try their food. I’ll be sure sure to do that!
Awesome meals. Great Natural Juices. Must try the natural juices and Carribean dishes.

I've seen this place around and had decided to go there rather than popeyes. The restaurant was huge  from the outside. It looks like nothing was really available at the time I went but the lady was extremely nice and asked what I wanted right away I ask for fried fish white rice with oxtail gravy and a salad. It took a while for it to get ready I was assuming that it was either being heated up or done fresh. I was right on the heating up part. I ignored all the signs their card reader was down, they didn't have change, so I ended up burning out all my singles. That would have been all okay if the food was good. Let's fast-forward home. I open up what looked presentable and was completely utterly disappointed. The food was not sellable at all nor was it edible. The fried escovitch was probably fried from days prior completely dried out and even tasted freezer burned from the small edible pieces. The white rice a saturated. The salad was I already Brown and the tomatoes were soggy. The greens tadted worst than krasdale branded greens. It was a waste of $16 period first and last time I'm ever going there. I couldn't even give it to pot starving (yes bajans yes!!!) if I was to purpose the 1 one-star for anything it will be the Stellar customer service, bit stellar customer service isn't enough to make me ever come back. Father forgive me for wasting food, but I wouldn't give that to my worst enemy. Luckily I would suede the next day. I have to review them

We are from out of town and we stop to get some jamaican food so someone recomanded PATS flavor Kruss and man can i say they have some ,Great food the Staff was very friendly ...., And the food was great  ...  we order the oxtail  it was off the chain also the curry goat ...., i will recomand any one to PATS FLAVOR KRUSS ...the price was cheap  .... also compare to were we narmaly  eat  whenever we are in brooklyn so to EVERYONE GO TO PATS FLAVOR KRUSS IF I COULD GIVE 10⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️I would!!!!! will always recomad anyone to this place .....

We visited the restaurant on Saturday morning oct. 29,2016. The lady was very friendly and we ordered an ok meal of akee and saltfish and a plate of scrambled eggs with one homemade ginger beer that we shared, we felt that the lady thought I was a tourist since I was the only white lady there in a predominantly black neighborhood with my Jamaican born husband so she must have felt it was okay to charge us $57 and pocket the money. Not only will we never eat at this spot again but we will be aure to steer everyone we can away from this thief. All future meals out will be at J and S restaurant at 352 Utica avenue, the food was terrific and a normal price of $12 for a large serving of oxtail and rice and peas, in fact so good that we went back for more. STAY AWAY-  STAY Away --STAY AWAY From PATS FLAVORS THEY STEAL YOUR MONEY FOR THEIR OWN POCKET !!!!!
Last week I saw them jerking chicken out stop for a bite and it was  so good I had to buy some and ship to my family in Texas.🍗🍗🍗🍗🍗🍗🍗🍱🍱🍱🍱🍴🍴🍴🍽🍽
